entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
